programme.title: Curieux Bégin
programme.desc: The sandwich challenge Forget the crustless sandwich as we bring you a world of sandwiches redesigned by Samir Benzeguir, alias Capitain Sandwich. We sample Montréal's best banh mi and a gluten-free special by K pour Katrine. Presenter : Christian Bégin.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc:
Cordouan, the last inhabited lighthouse
Recently added to the Unesco world heritage list, the Cordouan lighthouse welcomes thousands of visitors each year. For several centuries, it has been an invaluable aid for the complex navigation required to enter the Gironde estuary. A truly exceptional building and an important witness of the history of France. Report by: Olivier Chasle.
Presented by: Marine Barnérias.

programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.sub-title: Joue de boeuf et pappardelles maison
programme.desc: Beef cheeks and home-made pappardelle Chuck Hughes cooks tender beef cheeks and home-made pappardelle. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: De par chez nous
programme.desc: Social involvement By using their own experience of life, Domenic Padula of MoonFire Farm in Lower Burlington, Nova Scotia, and Simon Robert of Écolo-Vélo du Coeur in Granby, Quebec, contribute to offering youngsters in difficulty a brighter future. Presented by: Marième Ndiaye. Directed by: Julie Lambert, Catherine Leblanc (season 3, Canada, 2018)

programme.title: Ma vie rurale
programme.desc: Episode 7 Pierre, cattle farmer, might have found someone to take over his Ardèche farm. In the Drôme, Audrey wants to revolutionise traditional truffle-growing methods. Mélanie, a vet in Normandy, is confronted with a TB epidemic that threatens the region's farms. Aurore sets up her travelling grocery store in a small village. Directed by: Frédéric Martin (France, 2021)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Edible nature for tea-time If, as spring arrives, you are armed with some basic botanical knowledge, you can make yourself an afternoon snack with the flowers and herbs you come across when out and about.

programme.title: Les contes de Lupin
programme.sub-title: Le pêcheur, le phénix et les poissons

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Karaoke
Rocky and Lily have received a karaoke microphone, exactly what they need to rehearse the songs for their new album.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: La peinture française autour du monde
Mémoire de sang
programme.desc:
A man's body has been found on a work site, in a concrete slab. Married with a family he had disappeared eighteen years ago, his reappearance is a shock to his family. But the investigation, headed by the young Lieutenant Camille Gallois, rapidly hits a wall of silence and secrets...

Directed by: Olivier Guignard (France, 2018)

Screenplay: Marie Deshaires, Catherine Touzet

Cast: Isabelle Gélinas (Sandrine), Louise Monot (Louise), Blandine Bellavoir (Camille Gallois), Samir Boitard (Antoine), Pierre Cassignard (Armand), Martin Pautard (Robin), Lou Lambrecht (Amandine), Tomy Leconte (Victor), Gauthier Battoue (Nico), Selma Kouchy (Nora)

Genre: detective

Parental guidance: TV-PG

programme.title: Confidences à un inconnu
programme.desc:
Saint Petersburg, 1907. Natalia has all she needs for happiness: delightful son, rich husband who lets her live her life as she chooses, lovers who desire her. But that afternoon, a chance meeting with a stranger and a secret wish whispered to a bird change her tranquil life forever...

Directed by: Georges Bardawil (France/Switzerland/Italy.1994)

Cast: Sandrine Bonnaire, William Hurt, Jerzy Radziwilowicz

Genre: Dramedy

programme.title: Faits divers
programme.sub-title: Les heures avant le premier meurtre
programme.desc:
Episode 1: The hours before the first murder

The body of Benoit Charron, a ufologist, is found on a poultry farm. Constance and her team begin by suspecting Kevin Fontaine, but a video showing Kathleen Charron and Ted Connely, an American ufologist, instils doubts. At the same time, Marc Laveau, Charron's former accomplice, is released from prison...

Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 3, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay: Joanne Arseneau

Cast: Isabelle Blais (Constance Forest), Fred-Éric Salvail (Antoine Chevrier-Marseau), Émile Proulx-Cloutier (Frédérik Bérubé), Maxime Mailloux (Jonas), Patrick Hivon (Sylvain Lauzon), Stéphane Demers (Marc Laveau), Éric Robidoux (Kevin Fontaine), Steve Laplante (Denis Fontaine), Brigitte Lafleur (Kathleen Charron), Daniel Brière (Claude Voyer), Alexa-Jeanne Dubé (Zoé Forest), Guy Nadon (Serge Forest)

Genre: thriller

Parental guidance: not recommended for children under the age of 10 (-10)

programme.title: Faits divers
programme.sub-title: Le jour avant la découverte du tunnel
programme.desc:
Episode 2: The day before the tunnel is discovered

A feather is found on the spot where the sextortionists were murdered. A link to the Charron case? Marc Laveau tries to turn Kevin Lafontaine against his brother Denis. What is Claude Voyer, Fred's boss, doing in Mascouche? Why does he want Fred to investigate another case?

Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 3, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay: Joanne Arseneau

Cast: Isabelle Blais (Constance Forest), Fred-Éric Salvail (Antoine Chevrier-Marseau), Émile Proulx-Cloutier (Frédérik Bérubé), Maxime Mailloux (Jonas), Patrick Hivon (Sylvain Lauzon), Stéphane Demers (Marc Laveau), Éric Robidoux (Kevin Fontaine), Steve Laplante (Denis Fontaine), Brigitte Lafleur (Kathleen Charron), Daniel Brière (Claude Voyer), Alexa-Jeanne Dubé (Zoé Forest), Guy Nadon (Serge Forest)

Genre: thriller

Parental guidance: not recommended for children under the age of 10 (-10)

programme.title: Épicerie fine
programme.desc:
Season: 2021

The Pays d'Othe et d'Armance

The Aube, at the Ferme de l'Ancre where Nathan Cholet grows wheat and produces sunflower oil. Christophe Duminil shows that apples know no limits. With Mathieu Hugo we discover the incredible woodland biodiversity of the Pays d'Othe et d'Armance. Finally, the Chaource AOP cheese and its history rich in flavour.

Presented by: Guy Martin.

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: A friend of Clarissa's daughter is found dead, a scarf tied tightly around her neck. On the face of it the death was accidental, a simple game that ended in tragedy. But the investigators discover a secret forum on the high school site where manipulation and perversion seem to dominate... Directed by: François Bigrat (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: As suspicion falls on several pupils, Kelly discovers a pornographic video of Agathe's teacher. A discovery that raises doubts amongst the investigators, far from imagining that the lives of three people are at stake... Directed by: François Bigrat (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: La peinture française autour du monde
Les Seychelles, un paradis écologique
programme.desc:
Their name alone seems to open the doors to paradise: the Seychelles. With the breathtaking beauty of their ocean floor, bird sanctuaries and major nature reserves, the archipelago in the Indian Ocean has made environmental protection a national duty. The Seychelles are pioneers in the world of ecotourism.

Directed by: Éric Bacos (France, 2022)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 309 Manu intervient in extremis lors d'un rendez-vous dangereux. Eliott, lui, cherche un moyen de se défaire d'une influence néfaste. Réalisation : Christophe Barbier, Éric Woreth, Chris Nahon (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Aurore Delplace (Johanna), Fred Bianconi (Virgile), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Stéphane Monpetit (Eliott), Hubert Benhamdine (Christophe), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Julie Boulanger (Elsa), Marthe Fieschi (Léa), Teilo Azaïs (Enzo), Maëlle Mietton (Alice) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
